links.title: SPG Investor Presentation Deck Aug 2024
links.content:
INVESTOR PRESENTATION
Aug 2024
About Us
We are an emerging Premium performance / Premium-priced
golf equipment company formed in 2018, with disruptive
technology and a growing portfolio of golf products, including:
• Putters- Ultra low balance point, high MOI, CG
• Golf shafts – Elongated bend profile, symmetry 360 design
We expanded our manufacturing business in April 2022 to
include advanced premium golf shafts by opening a new shaft
manufacturing facility in St. Joseph, MO.
We intend to manufacture and assemble as many of our
products as possible in the U.S. and anticipate expanding into
golf apparel and other golf related product lines to enhance our
growth.
Our future expansions may include broadening our offerings
through mergers, acquisitions, or internal developments of
product lines that are complementary to our focus on premium
brands.
Nasdaq: SPGC 2
Presenting Management
GREG CAMPBELL
EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN
• Executive Chairman at Sacks Parente
since 2023 and Chairman of Sacks
Parente since 2022
• CEO VGrid Energy – 2016 - present
• Senior V.P. / General Manager of Anuvu
Satellite Communications
• Sold to SPAC and IPO
• Senior V.P. / General Manager of Lam
Research Corporation
• Founder and CEO of PMT
• IPO and sold to Lam Research
• Ph.D./M.S. in Engineering – UCLA &
B.A./M.A. in Engineering – Cambridge
University
Nasdaq: SPGC 3
Investment Highlights
• Recent introduction of Newton Motion Driver shaft and Newton Stock Symbol NASDAQ: SPGC
Motion Fairway Woods shaft has accelerated revenue growth by
Stock Price (as of 8/13/24) $3.30
~750% in 1H24 vs. 1H23
Shares Outstanding (as of 7/31/24) 1,459,587
• Independent lab testing offers proof that Sacks Parente Golf Market Cap $5M
putters help golfers make more putts
Cash and Equivalents (as of 6/30/24) $2.8M
Debt (as of 6/30/24) $0
• In-house manufacturing facility in Missouri, patented putters,
Enterprise Value $2M
and proprietary manufacturing processes for new shaft
business should reduce the supply chain risks and ensure Options (at 6/30/24) 220,160 @ $9.44 WAEP
quality control
Inside Ownership (%): 53%
• Rapid multi-year revenue growth expected primarily from
product launches of Company’s putters and line of Newton
Motion shafts, primarily via DTC channels
• Recently expanded into all 126 Club Champion stores
nationwide
• Japanese and Korean distributor already in place that provides
exposure to the world’s #2 and #3 golf markets → significant
international sales grow expected
Nasdaq: SPGC 4
Milestones
Unique Putter Sales
Founded Distributor to Korea
Initiatives Implemented
Founded as Sacks We signed with a

program for golf pros &

opportunity to start our Corporate IPO
virtual fitting August 2023; Net
proceeds $11.6M

Shaft Introduction
Ken Duke
“Distance Made Easy”
Ken was introduced to our In-house Manufacturing Facility
putters at a PGA event and has We moved production from
played with our Series 66 and outsourcing from Myanmar to in- Newton Motion Fairway
Series 99 ever since house in Missouri Woods Shaft Introduction

successful Newton Motion
Driver introduction

Golf Equipment Market Overview

PGA Champions Tour

Research Institute Ltd, two of the golf
industry’s leading independent research

worldwide each year, according to Golf
Million
Datatech, LLC
Nasdaq: SPGC 7
Our Products
Newton Motion Replacement Golf Shafts
• Newton Shafts – “Distance Made Easy”
• Newton Motion Driver Shaft was introduced in November 2023 and was the
first SKU in the product line and is targeted at the replacement driver shaft
market
• Newton Motion Fairway Woods Shaft was introduced in April 2024 and is
targeted at the replacement fairway wood shaft market
• Average ASP ~$250 for Driver Shaft and ~$225 for Fairway Woods Shaft
• Proprietary shaft engineering and construction delivers individually tailored
flex profiles that satisfy all swing speeds and deliver straighter shots and longer
distance from less swing effort
• Introduced the DOT system that normalizes shaft flex levels by eliminating
traditional system that defines shaft flex based on gender, age, or stiffness
Nasdaq: SPGC 8
Our Products
Putters Blade Putters
• “We make every putter a better putter”
• Proven results from The Golf Lab, an independent
Canadian golf research and education provider
• Made of steel, aluminum, titanium alloys, carbon fiber,
Series 66 Mg Series 99
tungsten, and various other materials, including our Flange Blade Putter Flange Blade Putter
patented magnesium face plate technologies
• Our patented Ultra Low Balance Point (ULBP) technology
creates THE ONLY putters in golf that naturally improve
Series 91 Series 39 True
one’s stroke and tighten putt dispersion
Toe Hang Flanged Blade Blade Putter
• All Sacks Parente putters have weight-forward designs to
Mallet Putters
deliver the right moment of inertia (MOI) and unmatched
stability to naturally optimize one’s putting stroke to
provide the best roll in golf
• Average ASP ~$350
• Learn about the patented ULBP technology:
https://youtu.be/ICdW_-s22sY Series 02 – Series 54MC Mallet Putter – One
“The DRAC” Stripe
• Full line of putters can be seen at www.sacksparente.com
Nasdaq: SPGC 9
“
Do Sacks Parente putters deliver on the
Independent Study by The Golf Lab
”
promise of making more putts?
Setup
• 15 volunteers with golf handicaps between 8 – 15
• Each golfer given 82 putts with their own putter and then 82 with a Sacks Parente ULBP
putter that they never used before
• The Golf Lab (independent entity) used its Gears full-body optical motion tracking
system to provide “hard data”
• Gears system measures the putting swing as it unfolds
• 600 images per putt are generated and analyzed in less than a second
Results
• Sacks Parente putters were empirically proven to:
• Make more putts
• Offer better aim/alignment
• Improve squared angle at impact
• Improve club path during swing
• Improve speed control by being naturally easier to align, providing a more
consistent stroke/speed control, better club path, and squaring the putter at impact
• 56% Increase in number of putts made
• On average, 32/82 putts were made by the golfers using their own putter vs. 50/82
made with the Sacks Parente putter
• Make percentage increased from 39% to 62%
Nasdaq: SPGC For more details on this study, please visit www.sacksparente.com/golf-lab-study 10
Competition
Our major competitors for golf shafts are:
• Fujikura Composites, Inc
• Mitsubishi Chemical (MRC)
• Graphite Design, (Asia) Co Ltd
• UST Mamiya
• Project X
Our major competitors for golf shafts are:
• TaylorMade
• Ping
• Acushnet (Scotty Cameron, Titleist brand) (Market share: 25%)
• Callaway Odyssey/Toulon brands. (Market share: 35%)
Nasdaq: SPGC 11
Initiatives Implemented in 2024 to Accelerate Growth
• Expanded Newton Motion product line beyond drivers – now includes fairway woods
• Newton Motion Driver shaft product experiencing favorable momentum and interest across the board
• Expanded availability of putters and Newton Motion shafts into all 126 Club Champion stores nationwide
• Introduced Incentive program for golf pros, custom club fitters, and golf instructors
• Foster additional point-of-sales outlets that can drive revenue growth and build long-term relationships
• Aggressive digital marketing campaigns on Google, Meta, Amazon and Shopify
• High return on ad spend
• Signed Champion’s Tour professional golfers to Newton Motion shaft sponsorships
• John Daly • Fred Funk
• Clark Dennis • Tim Petrovic
• Colin Montgomerie • Wes Short
• Doug Barron • Chris DiMarco
• Duffy Waldorf • Ken Duke
• Mark O’Meara
Nasdaq: SPGC 12
Champions Tour
Nasdaq: SPGC 13
Growth Strategy
Accelerate introduction of the Company’s technology in shafts, grips,
and putters over the next 3 - 5 years
Ramp production from manufacturing facility in Missouri to expand
equipment sales in U.S. and Asia – plant also offers new product
development given technology and R&D infrastructure
Expand product offerings by acquisition, joint venture, license, and/or
internal development
Grow DTC business – create visibility through traditional media channels,
new digital channels, or OTT channels; increase initiative to virtually fit
customers with our shafts and putters
Grow international retail and online sales (Korea, Japan, UK/Germany) –
current Korean distributor provides entrant into that fast-growing market with
Japan and Rest of Asia also important growth markets
Increase Tour Presence – Fastest growing shaft on Champions Tour. Plan is to
expand to PGA Tour and LPGA Tour
Nasdaq: SPGC 14
Investor & Media Relations Media Inquiries
CORE IR CORE IR
(516)222-2560 Jules Abraham
investors@sacksparente.com julesa@coreir.com
